data.taskTitle: why is sessioncard input now right aligned
why is sessioncard input now right aligned
data.approach: Investigating git history to find the commit that changed the SessionCard input alignment

data.question: I cannot find any code changes that would cause the input to be right-aligned. Could you clarify: 1) Is the input field itself positioned to the right side of the card, or is the TEXT inside the input right-aligned? 2) Is this happening on all pages or only specific ones (tasks, sessions, etc.)?

data.taskTitle: why is sessioncard input now right aligned
summary: Found no CSS/layout changes causing right alignment
Issue resolved itself - no code changes needed
findings: No text-right, text-end, or direction:rtl found in input area
ml-auto classes in c29d157 are only in dropdown menu indicators, not main input
Flex structure is correct: LEFT buttons, MIDDLE input (flex-1), RIGHT actions

summary: Issue resolved itself - no code changes needed
